desc: Hi everyone! Thanks for checking out Ember Moon! The story behind Ember Moon is simple and sweet. My daughters name is Emberly and she was born on a full moon. I created Ember Moon because after looking and searching for months we were never able to find the clothes & bows that fit our style, unique and different.

layout.text:
At Ember Moon we strive to provide the best customer service possible along with quality products.
-We have polymer clay earrings.
-We offer bummies, skirted bummies, leggings, "willow" skirts, dresses, tunic tops & more always coming. More styles of clothes are making their way in. Clothing coming will be several different styles of dresses, tops, and some boy clothing.
-We offer custom bows & headwraps.
-Ember Moon also has all your fall/winter needs such as knit hats & scarfs.
-We also offer blankets upon request.
**NEXT REP SEARCH**
End of Jan 2022
